str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pro and grapho; to write previously; figuratively, to announce, prescribe.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 1st Person Plural
str2: Our, our own. From thnetos; our.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Endurance, steadfastness, patient waiting for. From hupomeno; cheerful endurance, constancy.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
